returns._0: The address of the proxy admin.

changeAdmin(address).details: Changes the admin of the proxy. Only the current admin can call this function.

params.newAdmin: Address to transfer proxy administration to.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the backing implementation of the proxy. Only the admin can call this function.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the backing implementation of the proxy and call a function on the new implementation. This is useful to initialize the proxied contract.

params.data: Data to send as msg.data in the low level call. It should include the signature and the parameters of the function to be called, as described in https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.4.24/abi-spec.html#function-selector-and-argument-encoding.

documentation.text: @return The address of the proxy admin.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot change the admin of a proxy to the zero address"

arguments.value: Cannot change the admin of a proxy to the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot change the admin of a proxy to the zero address"

documentation.text:
@dev Sets the address of the proxy admin.
 @param newAdmin Address of the new proxy admin.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot call fallback function from the proxy admin"

arguments.value: Cannot call fallback function from the proxy admin

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot call fallback function from the proxy admin"

documentation.text: @dev Only fall back when the sender is not the admin.
